Prerequisites: ACG 2071 AND CGS 1100 WITH C OR BETTER.
Course Description:
PREREQUISITE:ACG 2071 AND CGS 1100 WITH C OR BETTER.
THIS COURSE INCLUDES AN ANALYSIS OF COST DATA FOR GOODS AND SERVICES FOR PLANNING, CONTROLLING AND DECISION-MAKING.
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major: STUDENTS WILL BE ABLE TO ANALYZE COST DATA FOR GOODS AND SERVICES. STUDENTS WILL BE ABLE TO PREPARE BUDGETS FOR PLANNING PURPOSES. STUDENTS WILL BE ABLE TO USE CONTROL MECHANISMS FOR FINANCIAL CONTROLS. STUDENTS WILL BE ABLE TO IDENTIFY COSTS AND REVENUES NECESSARY FOR DECISION-MAKING PURPOSES.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
